This is part of the upper reaches of the Ivel. @EnvAgencySE @AffinityWater take note. The habitat is recovering. Needs water all year. Great for our well-being and essential for biodiversity. @shamytaw @SianieRoo @JaneHawkins987 @maricaoneill @StinkStopthe @RedIndustries2 Thank you for sharing this with us. We would like to investigate further as we have officers out in the area, could you pls DM us the location and call our incident hotline on 0800 807060 to provide us with further details.

@Vince_Rookery @BenGoldsmith Yes this is bad farming, no doubt about it. Heavy clay soil, high rainfall area, serious erosion and runoff. I have photos of this land haemorrhaging soil and water in winter 19/20 and it was reported to the @EnvAgencySW At N Brewham.
